name: SRI SRI SRI CHAITANYA NITYANANDA GHANTA MRUDANGA SANGHA & LOKANRUTYA
briefDescription: SRI SRI SRI CHAITANYA NITYANANDA GHANTA MRUDANGA SANGHA AND LOKANRUTYA is a Registered NGO. It is a Socio Cultural organisation organising various socio cultural activities for the promotion and prevervation of traditional and folk art of the region, community plantation,library moement etc.it imparts training to the young and talented artists of the region,give them scope participate in various festivals and functions in and outside the state of Odisha.
